definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The underlying provider will take care of all necessary password hashing or decryption.
sentences.chinese: 底層的提供者會處理好必要的密碼散列或解密。

sentences.english: What is the ability to migrate to another provider?
sentences.chinese: 遷移到另一個提供者的能力如何？

sentences.english: Hapag-Lloyd is also the 2nd largest provider of containerized reefer capacity in the world.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯羅特也是世界第二大冷凍集裝箱運輸服務提供者。

sentences.english: The system sends notices to the selected providers.
sentences.chinese: 系統向選中的提供者發送通知。

sentences.english: CIALIS is a medicine prescribed by healthcare providers.
sentences.chinese: 犀利士是規定的醫學衛生保健提供者。

sentences.english: The value provider supplies the suggestion list to the auto-complete control.
sentences.chinese: 值提供者會爲自動完成控件提供建議列表。

sentences.english: What this does is initializing the provider with the configured settings to a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 此功能用配置的設置對提供者進行一定程度的初始化。

sentences.english: Possibly you are using the wrong provider for JNP.
sentences.chinese: 可能您正在使用錯誤的JNP提供者。

sentences.english: Each software service can act as a service provider or requester.
sentences.chinese: 每個軟件服務均可充當一個服務提供者或請求者。

sentences.english: Firstly, corporate foundations are the fund providers in the value chain.
sentences.chinese: 首先，企業基金會是價值鏈條中的資金提供者。

sentences.english: Users can search for providers based on their own ZIP codes.
sentences.chinese: 用戶可以根據他們自己的郵政編碼搜索服務提供者。

sentences.english: In this document we are focussing on a full authentication provider.
sentences.chinese: 在本文檔中，我們主要關注完整的身份驗證提供者。

sentences.english: The pluggable persistence provider concept remains an undelivered promise.
sentences.chinese: 可插入的持久性提供者概念仍處於未交付的階段。

sentences.english: For this example, you will first deploy the service provider application.
sentences.chinese: 對於此示例，將首先部署服務提供者應用程序。

sentences.english: It is obvious that business-owned semantic logic exists in the provider creation sub-layer.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，業務擁有的語義邏輯存在於提供者創建子層中。

sentences.english: The first difference is that a mediation acts as an intermediary between the provider and the requester.
sentences.chinese: 第一個差異是，中介作爲提供者與請求者之間的媒介。

definition: producer (of goods, commodities or farm produce etc)/manufacturer/(biology) autotroph
